clip.quote: The stakes feel so high when you're in it. So I thought it would make sort of the perfect context for a thriller.
clip.why_clipworthy: Captures the intense emotions involved in real estate transactions.
clip.suggested_hook: Ever felt the pressure of a competitive housing market? Here's how it inspired a thrilling novel.
